project_descr: This project will support the Government of National Accord (GNA) to deliver basic services and develop legitimacy by contributing to recovery and peace efforts.

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: light infrastructure rehabilitated. 
Output 2: Immediate capacity of municipalities boosted. 
Output 3: Local conflict analysis, facilitation and mediation strengthened.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and development - Canada
